attributes.additional_details:
Food Certification

Responsible department: Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs


I WOULD LIKE THE GOVERNMENT TO ARRANGE TO CERTIFY ALL FOODS ON HEALTH GROUNDS AND DESCRIPTION BEFORE IT CAN BE SOLD.
1.Any manufacturer whatever it is they wish to supply for use other than their own, should apply to the Gov’t first.
 2.That the details of that item is described fully showing all materials used and ingredients and also the process.
 3.The Gov’t then set down rules on that particular item and if what you are producing does not come within those rules, you will not be able to sell it.
 4.If the item does agree with Gov’t rules, then a certificate is given to produce.
 5.A fee would no doubt accompany any application.
6.Any person found selling with a certificate would be held to account, or selling other than what was agreed.
 PLEASE SIGN THIS PETITION
